rules_text:
Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
{2}{G}{G}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Put two 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach onto the battlefield.
